titleStmt.title: Carte Rajna, Quaderno del MS 32 della Biblioteca del Seminario di Padova

sourceDesc.p: Notebook of Pio Rajna containing a transcription of Huon d'Auvergne, MS 32 of the Seminario Vescovile of Padia. The article consists of 8 fascicules, none of which are bound to each other. The stamp of the Mareculliana library, a blue oval, appears on the first and last page of each fascicule. Additionally, a small black stamp, also from the Mareculliana, appears on the first page of each fascicule. There are thre foliation systems. The first, in the upper left corner, is in pencil and begins with 26 and goes to 33. The second is in black ink and is located in the upper right corner. The first fascicule is numbered "1.". The second fascicule does is not numbered here. All subsequent fascicules are numbered 3 to 8. The foliation in the upper right hand appears to be Rajna's. Finally, a pink foliation system appears in the upper right area of the recto side of every page. The first number of each fascicules are: 1, 14, 29, 41, 53, 65, 77, 89

div.head: Cod. 32.
div.p:
Cod. cart. in fo di ce [scribble] 117 la penultima delle qli porta
il num. 129 -- [long sentence scribbled out]
[scribble contines from previous line] mut. in gr., in fine e a qto fare manc.(?)
di fo anche nel corpo del vol- Scrittura del sec XIV,
2a meta ?, somigliante assai a [two undlear words]laurenz del Bovo__
